items.sentence: I don't like to travel with a lot of luggage.
Tom promised he'd call as soon as he arrived.
If I'd had the money, I would've bought that.
I suspect that you have conspired against me.
The news that Tom had won surprised everyone.
Tom must've spent a fortune on his new house.
Did you really think Tom and I were a couple?
Tom is a good husband and a wonderful father.
I couldn't help but notice Tom staring at me.
My husband never helps me with the housework.
